Text: trump says "I have held back on addessing the nation".  We know that, you damn coward.  You don't want to offend your paid protesters, looters, and fire starters.

POTUS talks NYC: "What is going on in NY is terrible, terrible. I lived in Manhattan, what's going on in Manhattan I have no idea, New York is going to have to toughen up, I'll send the national guard,"

I'm in touch with someone who's on the governors' call with President Trump right now. They and others listening in are alarmed. The president is urging governors to take back the streets, not be "weak," and use force as the nation faces growing racial unrest.
